description: Checks whether the Media Service resource name is available. The name must be globally unique.

name.description: The name of the resource. A name must be globally unique.

subscription_id.description: The unique identifier for a Microsoft Azure subscription.

api_version.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. The current version is 2015-10-01.

parameters.description: Properties needed to check the availability of a name.

type.description: The type of the resource - mediaservices.
